item.title: Using R and Python together for statistic tests
item.description: randomization test! although I have only come to know python this semester, I have already found some convient way to incorporate python codes into my lab data analysis. I have always stick to R studio for data analysis, yet the fast and more straight input of python code for certain statistical test is just too temping for a lazy person like me. For instance, In my attempt to analyze my collected swordfish mating behaviors data in the lab, I ran a randomization test on my data as my data failed the ANOVA assumptions.
